headline.main: Laird Keeps Close Eye on South Vietnam's Economy

byline.original: By MAX FRANKEL Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: Search for new Under Sec continues; F D Murphy and J N Irwin 2d are candidates most frequently mentioned at dept
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 14 The newest and most anxious student of South Vietnam's, economic problems here is Secretary of Defense Melvin R. Laird, whose interest is aroused by fears of a precipitate decline in the morale and effectiveness of Saigon's army.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 14  The newest and most anxious student of South Vietnam's, economic problems here is Secretary of Defense Melvin R. Laird, whose interest is aroused by fears of a precipitate decline in the morale and effectiveness of Saigon's army.
